author: James Van Straten
title: Metaplanet Overtakes Coinbase With 10K BTC, Becomes No. 9 Bitcoin Holder
description: The Tokyo-based company bought another 1,112 BTC for $117.2 million.
content:
Metaplanet (3350), the Japanese company that's committed to buying bitcoin 
, boosted its holdings to 10,000 BTC, overtaking crypto exchange Coinbase (COIN) to now own the ninth-largest stash among … [+1151 chars]
